meanings.definition: A cosmetic product used to add shine and color to the lips.
meanings.sent1: She always carries her favorite lipgloss in her purse.
meanings.sent2: Her lips looked shiny and colorful after applying the lipgloss.
meanings.sent3: The lipgloss made her lips sparkle like a gem.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a fresh coat of lipgloss.
meanings.sent5: The lipgloss transformed her lips into a work of art.

meanings.definition: To apply lipgloss to the lips for a glossy finish.
meanings.sent1: She carefully lipglossed her lips before the party.
meanings.sent2: He quickly lipglosses his lips before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The magician lipglossed his lips and made them disappear!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like poetry, smoothly lipglossing the situation.
meanings.sent5: The music flowed through her, lipglossing her soul with joy.
